overview: Melissa and Nick are engaged and on their way to visit with Nick's folks. Melissa has her doubts about Nick. And she's starting to have doubts about her transmission and radiator too. As her car breaks down, Missy takes a much needed nap, only to awake in another time and place...In a dusty old ghost town where women are whores, the meeting place is a saloon, and the man of her dreams is a guy named Bart.
title: Ghost Town
